ygData.subject: Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: For the lower levels, like me,  couldn t you get the same effect twisting Selo s and Lullaby?  One successful nod and you ve got yourself enough of a head
ygData.messageBody:
For the lower levels, like me, couldn't you get the
same effect twisting Selo's and Lullaby? One
successful nod and you've got yourself enough of a
head start to make it to the zone.

Tomerrilin

--- Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
>
> That reminds me, always keep screech mem'd ;-)
>
> [connecting to shadowmen thread] This is how a
> bard can outrun
> shadowmen. Selo's + Screech. The shadowmen move
> so fast in the
> opposite direction that they are out of agro
> radius within about
> 2 seconds and give up the chase. So if someone
> asks you if you
> can outrun shadowmen, you can if you are creative.
> Just twist
> Selos and Screech and take off.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
